snippet: Woody Harrelson and Frankie Hyman, who together wrote the play “Bullet for Adolf,” started their friendship as construction workers in Houston.
abstract: Woody Harrelson and Frankie Hyman, who together wrote the play Bullet for Adolf, started their friendship nearly 30 years before as construction workers in Houston.
lead_paragraph: Woody Harrelson and Frankie Hyman, who together wrote the play “Bullet for Adolf,” started their friendship as construction workers in Houston.

headline.seo: ‘Bullet for Adolf’ by Woody Harrelson and Frankie Hyman
headline.main: Two Friends Write a Play After Work
headline.print_headline: Two Friends Write a Play After Work
